name: Sergio
review: I ordered the 10th gen laptop and received a 9th gen laptop

name: Nwokedi N.
review: Poor battery life, annoying ads on asus apps,..could be better

name: Mike Oliviero
review: Best Laptop I had in many years. Works great. Dual Monitor is the best for multitasking

name: Kelly A. Gegg
review: I've had this laptop for less than a week but I've been able to get so much more creative with it!! My blog is improving as I can work on it anywhere! Super easy to carry around with me and work in the car while my hubby drives or at the park or anywhere!!

name: Gus
review: Nice solid fast PC. It sounds like a small number of users got a bad unit but so far mine is working great. Fast boot 5-10 secs.Cons: should have an SD reader/RAM built in and should offer choice of larger battery although 2 hours is OK for me.

name: William Keys
review: Amazing laptop. I purchased it to do video editing and it beyond perfect. Very fast laptop, lots of memory and perfect for my needs.One person found this helpful

name: David Cung
review: Powerful and fast machine with amazing features. Love the built in screen extenders and ergonomic keyboard stand. Amazing picture quality and graphics.

name: Peter
review: Best laptop I have ever owned!!

name: Mac
review: Getting 2nd zenbook , 1st one network adaptor fail, never had that happen so probably a fluke. Love the duel screen. Would have given 5 stars but the 2nd screen is not set at a perfect angle
